info.name: Dark Project Honeypot
info.description: Change Project Honeypot (http://www.projecthoneypot.org) to white text on a black background to make it easier on the eyes of aging webmasters. Nothing fancy. Works for me. I am igor at http://techlorebyigor.blogspot.com and I code dark styles for several web sites. Wherever there is white, let us replace that with black.
